At<S>1722</S> that<S>1565</S> time<S>2540</S> Herod<S>2264</S> the tetrarch<S>5076</S> heard<S>191</S> of the fame<S>189</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S>, <sup>tetrarch: or, governor over four provinces</sup>
And<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto his<S>846</S> servants<S>3816</S>, This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> John<S>2491</S> the Baptist<S>910</S>; he<S>846</S> is risen<S>1453</S> from<S>575</S> the dead<S>3498</S>; and<S>2532</S> therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> mighty works<S>1411</S> do shew forth themselves<S>1754</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>do: or, are wrought by him</sup>
For<S>1063</S> Herod<S>2264</S> had laid hold<S>2902</S> on John<S>2491</S>, and bound<S>1210</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> put<S>5087</S> him in<S>1722</S> prison<S>5438</S> for<S>1223</S> Herodias'<S>2266</S> sake<S>1223</S>, his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> Philip's<S>5376</S> wife<S>1135</S>.
For<S>1063</S> John<S>2491</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, It is<S>1832</S> not<S>3756</S> lawful<S>1832</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to have<S>2192</S> her<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he would<S>2309</S> have put<S>615</S> him<S>846</S> to death<S>615</S>, he feared<S>5399</S> the multitude<S>3793</S>, because<S>3754</S> they counted<S>2192</S> him<S>846</S> as<S>5613</S> a prophet<S>4396</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when Herod's<S>2264</S> birthday<S>1077</S> was kept<S>71</S>, the daughter<S>2364</S> of Herodias<S>2266</S> danced<S>3738</S> before them<S>1722</S> <S>3319</S>, and<S>2532</S> pleased<S>700</S> Herod<S>2264</S>. <sup>before: Gr. in the midst</sup>
Whereupon<S>3606</S> he promised<S>3670</S> with<S>3326</S> an oath<S>3727</S> to give<S>1325</S> her<S>846</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> she would ask<S>154</S>.
And<S>1161</S> she, being before instructed<S>4264</S> of<S>5259</S> her<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S>, said<S>5346</S>, Give<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S> here<S>5602</S> John<S>2491</S> Baptist's<S>910</S> head<S>2776</S> in<S>1909</S> a charger<S>4094</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the king<S>935</S> was sorry<S>3076</S>: nevertheless for<S>1161</S> <S>1223</S> the oath's sake<S>3727</S>, and<S>2532</S> them which sat with him at meat<S>4873</S>, he commanded<S>2753</S> it to be given<S>1325</S> her.
And<S>2532</S> he sent<S>3992</S>, and beheaded<S>607</S> John<S>2491</S> in<S>1722</S> the prison<S>5438</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> head<S>2776</S> was brought<S>5342</S> in<S>1909</S> a charger<S>4094</S>, and<S>2532</S> given<S>1325</S> to the damsel<S>2877</S>: and<S>2532</S> she brought<S>5342</S> it to her<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S>, and took up<S>142</S> the body<S>4983</S>, and<S>2532</S> buried<S>2290</S> it<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> went<S>2064</S> and told<S>518</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
When<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> heard<S>191</S> of it, he departed<S>402</S> thence<S>1564</S> by<S>1722</S> ship<S>4143</S> into<S>1519</S> a desert<S>2048</S> place<S>5117</S> apart<S>2596</S> <S>2398</S>: and<S>2532</S> when the people<S>3793</S> had heard<S>191</S> thereof, they followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S> on foot<S>3979</S> out of<S>575</S> the cities<S>4172</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went forth<S>1831</S>, and saw<S>1492</S> a great<S>4183</S> multitude<S>3793</S>, and<S>2532</S> was moved with compassion<S>4697</S> toward<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he healed<S>2323</S> their<S>846</S> sick<S>732</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when it was<S>1096</S> evening<S>3798</S>, his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S> to him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, This is<S>2076</S> a desert<S>2048</S> place<S>5117</S>, and<S>2532</S> the time<S>5610</S> is now<S>2235</S> past<S>3928</S>; send<S>630</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> away<S>630</S>, that<S>2443</S> they may go<S>565</S> into<S>1519</S> the villages<S>2968</S>, and buy<S>59</S> themselves<S>1438</S> victuals<S>1033</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, They need<S>5532</S> not<S>3756</S> depart<S>565</S> <S>2192</S>; give<S>1325</S> ye<S>5210</S> them<S>846</S> to eat<S>5315</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, We have<S>2192</S> here<S>5602</S> but<S>3756</S> <S>1508</S> five<S>4002</S> loaves<S>740</S>, and<S>2532</S> two<S>1417</S> fishes<S>2486</S>.
<S>1161</S> He said<S>2036</S>, Bring<S>5342</S> them<S>846</S> hither<S>5602</S> to me<S>3427</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he commanded<S>2753</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> to sit down<S>347</S> on<S>1909</S> the grass<S>5528</S>, and<S>2532</S> took<S>2983</S> the five<S>4002</S> loaves<S>740</S>, and<S>2532</S> the two<S>1417</S> fishes<S>2486</S>, and looking up<S>308</S> to<S>1519</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, he blessed<S>2127</S>, and<S>2532</S> brake<S>2806</S>, and gave<S>1325</S> the loaves<S>740</S> to his disciples<S>3101</S>, and<S>1161</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> to the multitude<S>3793</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they did<S>5315</S> all<S>3956</S> eat<S>5315</S>, and<S>2532</S> were filled<S>5526</S>: and<S>2532</S> they took up<S>142</S> of the fragments<S>2801</S> that remained<S>4052</S> twelve<S>1427</S> baskets<S>2894</S> full<S>4134</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they that had eaten<S>2068</S> were<S>2258</S> about<S>5616</S> five thousand<S>4000</S> men<S>435</S>, beside<S>5565</S> women<S>1135</S> and<S>2532</S> children<S>3813</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> constrained<S>315</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> to get<S>1684</S> into<S>1519</S> a ship<S>4143</S>, and<S>2532</S> to go before<S>4254</S> him<S>846</S> unto<S>1519</S> the other side<S>4008</S>, while<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> he sent<S>630</S> the multitudes<S>3793</S> away<S>630</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he had sent<S>630</S> the multitudes<S>3793</S> away<S>630</S>, he went up<S>305</S> into<S>1519</S> a mountain<S>3735</S> apart<S>2596</S> <S>2398</S> to pray<S>4336</S>: and<S>1161</S> when the evening<S>3798</S> was come<S>1096</S>, he was<S>2258</S> there<S>1563</S> alone<S>3441</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the ship<S>4143</S> was<S>2258</S> now<S>2235</S> in the midst<S>3319</S> of the sea<S>2281</S>, tossed<S>928</S> with<S>5259</S> waves<S>2949</S>: for<S>1063</S> the wind<S>417</S> was<S>2258</S> contrary<S>1727</S>.
And<S>1161</S> in the fourth<S>5067</S> watch<S>5438</S> of the night<S>3571</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went<S>565</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, walking<S>4043</S> on<S>1909</S> the sea<S>2281</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when the disciples<S>3101</S> saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S> walking<S>4043</S> on<S>1909</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, they were troubled<S>5015</S>, saying<S>3004</S> <S>3754</S>, It is<S>2076</S> a spirit<S>5326</S>; and<S>2532</S> they cried out<S>2896</S> for<S>575</S> fear<S>5401</S>.
But<S>1161</S> straightway<S>2112</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> spake<S>2980</S> unto them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Be of good cheer<S>2293</S>; it is<S>1510</S> I<S>1473</S>; be<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S> afraid<S>5399</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S> and said<S>2036</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, if<S>1487</S> it be<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S>, bid<S>2753</S> me<S>3165</S> come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> thee<S>4571</S> on<S>1909</S> the water<S>5204</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S>, Come<S>2064</S>. And<S>2532</S> when Peter<S>4074</S> was come down<S>2597</S> out of<S>575</S> the ship<S>4143</S>, he walked<S>4043</S> on<S>1909</S> the water<S>5204</S>, to go<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when he saw<S>991</S> the wind<S>417</S> boisterous<S>2478</S>, he was afraid<S>5399</S>; and<S>2532</S> beginning<S>756</S> to sink<S>2670</S>, he cried<S>2896</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, save<S>4982</S> me<S>3165</S>. <sup>boisterous: or, strong</sup>
And<S>1161</S> immediately<S>2112</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> stretched forth<S>1614</S> his hand<S>5495</S>, and caught<S>1949</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, O thou of little faith<S>3640</S>, wherefore<S>1519</S> <S>5101</S> didst thou doubt<S>1365</S>?
And<S>2532</S> when they<S>846</S> were come<S>1684</S> into<S>1519</S> the ship<S>4143</S>, the wind<S>417</S> ceased<S>2869</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> they that were in<S>1722</S> the ship<S>4143</S> came<S>2064</S> and worshipped<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Of a truth<S>230</S> thou art<S>1488</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when they were gone over<S>1276</S>, they came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the land<S>1093</S> of Gennesaret<S>1082</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when the men<S>435</S> of that<S>1565</S> place<S>5117</S> had knowledge<S>1921</S> of him<S>846</S>, they sent out<S>649</S> into<S>1519</S> all<S>3650</S> that<S>1565</S> country round about<S>4066</S>, and<S>2532</S> brought<S>4374</S> unto him<S>846</S> all<S>3956</S> that were<S>2192</S> diseased<S>2560</S>;
And<S>2532</S> besought<S>3870</S> him<S>846</S> that<S>2443</S> they might<S>680</S> only<S>3440</S> touch<S>680</S> the hem<S>2899</S> of his<S>846</S> garment<S>2440</S>: and<S>2532</S> as many as<S>3745</S> touched<S>680</S> were made perfectly whole<S>1295</S>.
